posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I have a T205 Frank Chance SGC 40 with a Piedmont back I'd like to trade for another T205 or T206 HOFer in similar condition (really need a T206 Bender portrait). Thanks.

Greg

I'd be willing to trade a T205 Fred Clarke (HOF) in the same condition for the Chance.
Let me know if your interested.
Thanks,
Cory
